text: Maria Vittoria Cassana (died 1711) was an Italian painter of the late-Baroque. She was the daughter of Giovanni Francesco Cassana. She painted small pictures of religious subjects for private collections. ==See also== *Cassana (family) ==References== * Category:1711 deaths Category:18th-century Italian painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Italian women painters Category:Year of birth unknown Category:18th-century women artists Category:17th-century women artists
title: Maria Vittoria Cassana
